subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Art
Photography
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the exhibit 2010 Fine Art are using the World Cup as a chance to try to raise the profile of South African artists and generate interest from abroad in contemporary African art.
snippet: Organizers of the exhibit 2010 Fine Art are using the World Cup as a chance to try to raise the profile of South African artists and generate interest from abroad in contemporary African art.
